author: Mildred
contents:
smswithoutborders In this age of communication, keep in touch with your contacts across the internet without access to an active internet connection. Store your access to your favourite communications platforms while online, use them while offline.
How it works With SMSWithoutBorders, you can send emails, tweet and chat on telegram without an active internet connection. By using our app, you can send messages securely through a network of SMS gateways to stay connected
title: swob

author: Afkanerd
